gashas.name: Hercule's Fortune Summon
gashas.description:
{center:begin}Perform Summons with {color : #FFFF00}Hercule's Fortune Summon Tickets{color}
to get {color : #FF9900}Hercule Statues{color}!{center}

courses.title: {color: #FFFF00}Hercule's Fortune Summon{color}
courses.description:
Use {color : #FFFF00}1 Hercule's Fortune Summon Ticket{color}
to perform {color : #FF9900}a Single Summon{color}!

courses.title: {color: #FFFF00}Hercule's Fortune Summon{color}
courses.description:
Use {color : #FFFF00 }5 Hercule’s Fortune Summon Tickets{color} to perform {color : #FF9900 }a Multi-Summon{color}!
Get {color : #FF9900 }5 Hercule Statues per Multi-Summon{color}!
